name: Akoth the Seared

skills.name: Molten Punch
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease C.RATE] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-target damage scaling from DEF. High multiplier (4.0) makes this a strong DEF-scaling A1.
50% base chance to place 30% Decrease Crit Rate for 2 turns. Fully booked: 70% chance. Requires accuracy check.

skills.book_value: High priority - increases debuff chance from 50% to 70% (+20%), plus 15% damage boost
skills.notes: Strong A1 for DEF-based champions. Decrease Crit Rate useful for survivability in dungeons and Faction Wars. Fully book for reliable debuff application.

skills.name: Pyroclasm (Cooldown: 3 turns)
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 20% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns. The chance of placing the debuff increases by 20% for each alive enemy.

effects.notes: AOE damage scaling from DEF. Lower multiplier than A1 but hits all enemies.
HP Burn for 2 turns. Chance scales with alive enemies: 20% (1 enemy), 40% (2), 60% (3), 80% (4), 100% (5). Does NOT require books for 100% chance in full waves. Requires accuracy check.

skills.book_value: Medium priority - damage boost only (+30% total), HP Burn chance is already 100% in 5-enemy waves
skills.notes: Key HP Burn skill. 100% chance on full waves (5 enemies) without books. Scales down to 20% on single targets (not reliable for bosses). Strong for Spider, Fire Knight waves, and dungeon trash. Synergizes with Passive (Fear on HP Burn tick) and A3 (cooldown increase on HP Burn targets).

skills.name: Pyretic Release (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of increasing the cooldowns of all skills by 2 turns on enemies under [HP Burn] debuffs. Also places a [Shield] buff equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP on all allies for 2 turns. Instantly activates this skill when this Champion is revived by Rian the Conjurer.

effects.notes: AOE damage scaling from DEF. Same multiplier as A2.
Increases cooldowns by 2 turns on enemies under HP Burn. 50% base chance, 70% fully booked. Conditional on HP Burn presence. Requires accuracy check.
Shield = 30% of Akoth's MAX HP (20% base + 10% from books) on all allies for 2 turns. Scales with Akoth's HP, not ally HP.
Auto-triggers when revived by Rian the Conjurer. Unique synergy - instant shield + cooldown control on revive.

skills.book_value: HIGHEST priority - reduces cooldown 5→4 turns, increases shield 20%→30% (+50% shield value), increases debuff chance 50%→70%
skills.notes: Signature skill with unique Rian synergy. Auto-triggers on revive for instant team protection. Cooldown increase is devastating when combo'd with A2 HP Burn. Shield scales from Akoth's HP (build HP% to maximize). Fully book for 4-turn CD and 30% shield. Core skill for Faction Wars and dungeon progression.

skills.name: Fiery Swatch (Passive)
skills.description: Has a 10% chance of placing a [Fear] debuff on an enemy for 1 turn whenever they receive damage from a [HP Burn] debuff.

effects.notes: 10% base chance, 25% fully booked. Triggers whenever ANY enemy takes HP Burn damage. Does NOT require accuracy check (passive proc). Minor CC utility.

skills.book_value: Low priority - only increases proc chance from 10% to 25%. Book after A1 and A3.
skills.notes: Passive CC that triggers on HP Burn ticks. Useful for waves but unreliable (25% max). Does not require accuracy. Synergizes with A2 HP Burn spam. Minor utility, not a core mechanic.

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in all Battles by 25%.

general: - Master Hexer: CRITICAL for HP Burn extension (30% chance to extend HP Burn by 1 turn) - maximizes A2/passive synergy
- Harvest Despair: 60% chance to place Leech when passive places Fear on HP Burn tick - sustain synergy
- Warmaster: DEF-scaling champion, single-hit skills → 60% proc rate for 4% MAX HP damage
- Life Drinker: Sustain when HP ≤50% (5% of damage inflicted)
- Pinpoint Accuracy + Swarm Smiter + Evil Eye: High ACC required for HP Burn, Cooldown Increase, Decrease C.RATE
- Lore of Steel: Boosts Lifesteal/Accuracy set bonuses
SKIP Opportunist: Arena rating 3/10, not worth mastery point for low Arena usage (Fear is passive proc, not primary mechanic)
DEF-BASED BUILD: Warmaster (not Giant Slayer) - all skills are single-hit AOE

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI is generally good - prioritizes A3 for shield/cooldown control, uses A2 for HP Burn spread. No major issues on auto.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: HP Burn specialist with Rian the Conjurer synergy
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: When paired with Rian the Conjurer, Akoth's A3 auto-triggers on revive, providing instant team shield and cooldown control. Strong HP Burn synergy for Spider, Fire Knight, and dungeon waves. Can be built for reflect damage comps with Brimstone blessing.

mechanics_advisory: DEF-based HP Burn specialist with unique Rian the Conjurer synergy. A3 instantly activates when revived by Rian, making this combo strong for Faction Wars and dungeon progression. HP Burn on A2 scales with number of alive enemies (20-100% chance). Passive Fear proc (25% at max books) adds minor CC. Strong for Fire Knight (HP Burn + shield), Spider (HP Burn wave clear), and Demonspawn Faction Wars. Not recommended for Clan Boss (HP Burn capped at 50k/turn) or Arena (too slow, lacks burst).
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: DEF-based HP Burn specialist with Rian synergy. Strong for Demonspawn Faction Wars and dungeon waves. User Priority: Dungeons (HP Burn team preference), Faction Wars (Demonspawn in progress).
